00026 void convertor( GRAPH<int,int> &G, int row, int column ){
00027         
00028         int count = 0, weightCount;
00029         node n;
00030         edge e;
00031         forall_nodes( n, G )
00032                 count++;
00033         leda::matrix M( count, count );
00034         for( int i = 0; i < M.dim1(); i++ ){
00035                 for( int j = 0; j < M.dim2(); j++ ){
00036                         M( i, j ) = 0;
00037                 }
00038         }
00039         list<edge> elist;
00040         list_item it;
00041         node_array<int> Index( G, 0 );
00042 
00043         count = 0;
00044         forall_nodes( n, G ){
00045                 Index[ n ] = count;
00046                 count++;
00047         }
00048 
00049         forall_nodes( n , G ){
00050                 weightCount = 0;
00051                 elist = G.out_edges( n );
00052                 forall_items( it, elist ){
00053                         e = elist[ it ];
00054                         weightCount += G[ elist[it ] ];
00055                 }
00056                 forall_items( it, elist ){
00057                         e = elist[ it ];
00058                         //M( Index[ n ], Index[ G.target( e ) ] ) = (double)( G[ e ] ) / (double)( weightCount );
00059                         M( Index[ n ], Index[ G.target( e ) ] ) = (double)( G[ e ] );
00060                 }
00061         }
00062         //ofstream MarkovMatrix("C://GraphUnion//markov.txt", ios::in | ios::trunc);
00063         ofstream MarkovMatrix("C://GraphUnion//Bimax//bimax.txt", ios::in | ios::trunc);
00064         MarkovMatrix << M.dim1() << " " << M.dim2() << " " << row << " " << column;
00065         for( int i = 0; i < M.dim1(); i++ ){
00066                 for( int j = 0; j < M.dim2(); j++ ){
00067                         MarkovMatrix << (int) M( i, j ) << " ";
00068                 }
00069                 MarkovMatrix << "\n";
00070         }
00071         MarkovMatrix.close();
00072 }
00073 
00074 matrix graphToMatrix(GRAPH<leda::string,int>& G, list<node> A, list<node> B, bool weighted ){
00075                 int i,j;
00076                 double d = 0.0;
00077                 int row=A.size(),col=B.size();
00078                 matrix m(row,col);
00079                 node_array<int> A1(G),B1(G);
00080 
00081                 edge e;
00082                 node n;
00083                 for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
00084                                 for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
00085                                         m(i,j) = (double)0;
00086                                 }
00087                 }
00088                 i=0;
00089                 forall(n,A){
00090                                 A1[n] = i;
00091                                 i++;
00092                 }
00093 
00094                 i=0;
00095                 forall(n,B){
00096                                 B1[n] = i;
00097                                 i++;
00098                 }
00099 
00100                 node sn,tn;
00101                 forall_edges(e,G){
00102                                 sn = G.source(e);
00103                                 tn = G.target(e);
00104 
00105                                 if ( weighted ){
00106                                         m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) = G[e];
00107                                 }else{
00108                                         m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) = m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) + (double)1.0;
00109                                 }
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 array<double> colSum( m.dim1() );
00113                 array<double> colStats( m.dim1() );
00114                 for( i = 0; i < m.dim1(); i++ ){
00115                                 colSum[ i ] = 0;
00116                                 colStats[ i ] = 0;
00117                 }
00118 
00119                 for( i = 0; i < m.dim1(); i++ ){
00120                                 for( j = 0; j < m.dim2(); j++ ){
00121                                                 colSum[ i ] += m( i, j );
00122                                                 if( m( i, j ) > 0 )
00123                                                         colStats[ i ]++;
00124                                 }
00125                 }
00126                 for( i = 0; i < m.dim1(); i++ ){
00127                                 for( j = 0; j < m.dim2(); j++ ){
00128                                         if( m( i, j ) > 0 ){
00129                                                 m( i, j ) = m( i, j ) / colSum[ i ];
00130                                         }
00131                                 }
00132                 }
00133                 m.print();
00134                 return m;
00135 }

00137 matrix graphToMatrix(GRAPH<int,int>& G,list<node> A,list<node> B, int rowComing, int columnComing , char filename[ 1024 ], bool weighted=true){
00138                 int i,j;
00139                 double d = 0.0;
00140                 int row=A.size(),col=B.size();
00141                 matrix m(row,col);
00142                 node_array<int> A1(G),B1(G);
00143 
00144                 edge e;
00145                 node n;
00146                 for ( i=0 ; i<row ; i++ ){
00147                                 for ( j=0 ; j<col ; j++ ){
00148                                         m(i,j) = (double)0;
00149                                 }
00150                 }
00151                 i=0;
00152                 forall(n,A){
00153                                 A1[n] = i;
00154                                 i++;
00155                 }
00156 
00157                 i=0;
00158                 forall(n,B){
00159                                 B1[n] = i;
00160                                 i++;
00161                 }
00162 
00163                 node sn,tn;
00164                 forall_edges(e,G){
00165                                 sn = G.source(e);
00166                                 tn = G.target(e);
00167 
00168                                 if ( weighted ){
00169                                         m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) = G[e];
00170                                 }else{
00171                                         m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) = m(A1[sn],B1[tn]) + (double)1.0;
00172                                 }
00173                 }
00174                 char file[1024] = "";
00175                 sprintf( file , "%s%s", "C://GraphUnion//", filename ); 
00176                 ofstream MarkovMatrix( file , ios::in | ios::trunc);
00177                 for( int i = 0; i < m.dim1(); i++ ){
00178                         for( int j = 0; j < m.dim2(); j++ ){
00179                                 MarkovMatrix << (int) m( i, j ) << " ";
00180                         }
00181                         MarkovMatrix << "\n";
00182                 }
00183                 MarkovMatrix.close();
00184                 return m;
